name: Seven: Reboot
description:
Seven: Reboot is a cryptic experimental puzzle game. It consists of a wide variety of puzzles some of wich are pretty easy but other are almost impossible to solve by one person. It’s a game about numbers and their meaning, about information and ways to hide it in everything!

Almost all of the puzzelse in the game are available from the start.
It is a game where you start by solving simple puzzelse and gain knowlage of game's machanics. And then you realize that there are more puzzles that were there all the time but you simply didn't realise that they were puzzles! And that is the main beauty of the game! As you progress through the game puzzles get more and more complicated, even to the point where it is impossible to solve them on your own.

Make notes, construct theories, communicate with other player and solve the mysteries of Seven!
